Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with Nike standing with a wreath and palm-branch. The shoulder is decorated with ovules. At the rear is a ring handle. The lamp stands on a raised base. Brown-buff clay; brown slip. Plaster mould. The nozzle and handle are broken.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1948)
